channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #157 – Alone Game Developer Talks About Developing and Launching HoPiKo Game

item.title: By: Ed Maurina
item.dc:creator: Ed Maurina
item.description:
Hi folks. I just finished uploading the latest version of the game code. So if you downloaded it before I posted here, please go get another copy.
Cheers, Ed
